title: google maps posting publicly not work
content:
after i take a photo, it can show the geolocation in google photo, means i can get the exactly location where i took it, i know it's saved on photo EXIF, but when i use "google photo" upload the photo to google maps, the posting publicly just show select a place, when i click "select a place" it just show the location where i m nearly by.. no auto detect my EXIF data, if i use other photo album app it will auto detect the photo taken from "north atlantic ocean!!  my previous LG G5 don't have this problem

i did try both P2XL & P3XL w/ latest android 10 also got the same problem, i did check my setting all about location is correct, how to fix it? or it's a bug? thanks!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
